extracted_information: The web content is the main page for CodeMirror. It describes the editor's features and capabilities. It references 'Version 5' as a previous major version, implying the content on this page refers to the current major version, though the specific latest version number (e.g., v6.x.y) is not explicitly stated on this page. The content does not provide direct download links for the library files (e.g., as a zip archive). It links to the project's GitHub repository (https://github.com/codemirror/dev), which is where the source code and releases are managed, and also links to various language support packages on GitHub.
